title: Trump wants to make Gaza the Riviera, but what's it like on the ground?
shortDescription: Little infrastructure in Gaza is still standing. Here's how the territory has evolved under Israeli control.

title: Trump's early plans to reshape the government, remake the world
shortDescription: Forget the first 100 days. In the first 17, Trump has moved with a velocity faster than any modern president. Here are five lessons learned.

title: Speaker Johnson says Trump's Gaza plan is 'bold'
shortDescription: Speaker Mike Johnson expresses support for President Donald Trump's idea for the U.S. to take over Gaza.

title: Second US judge blocks Trump's birthright citizenship order
shortDescription: The judge, an appointee of Trump's Democratic predecessor Joe Biden, issued a nationwide preliminary injunction blocking Trump's order.

title: House speaker claims Trump is acting within scope
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson told reporters that President Trump's recent actions are "not a usurpation of authority in any way."

title: Trump to federal employees: buyout or possible furlough
shortDescription: The Trump administration warned federal employees that they could be furloughed if they don't accept a buyout offer.

title: 5 takeaways from Trump's radical Gaza plan
shortDescription: President Donald Trump wants to turn war-ravaged Gaza into the 'Riviera of the Middle East.' Here's what that means.

title: Trump says US should take over Gaza | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: At least 20,000 federal workers have taken President Trump's buyout offer as a Thursday deadline nears. These and more stories on The Excerpt.

title: World reacts to President Trump's Gaza proposal
shortDescription: U.S. allies, adversaries and residents of countries around the world had strong reactions to President Trump's proposal to take over Gaza.

title: 'Don't let democracy die': Anti-Trump protesters rally in cities across US
shortDescription: The protests by the 50501 Movement come days after rallies in opposition of Trump's immigration policies were held across the country.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump, DOGE and what's happening at USAID
shortDescription: Thousands of US foreign aid workers placed on leave. Here is the news to know on Wednesday.

title: After initial concerns, GOP senators close to delivering Trump's cabinet
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's cabinet appears on a glide path to completion. It wasn't always so simple.

title: Almost all USAID workers across globe put on leave as Trump guts agency
shortDescription: Thousands of USAID employees, except for essential personnel, were notified they will be placed on administrative leave at the end of Friday.

title: CIA offers buyout to workforce to align with Trump priorities
shortDescription: The CIA is offering most employees a buyout as part of a plan to realign itself with Donald Trump's agenda. Essential spies, analysts won't get one

title: Trump says US will 'take over' Gaza Strip
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said during a news conference with Israel's prime minister that the U.S. should "takeover" the war-torn Gaza Strip.

title: Trump pushes to close Education Dept.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters that Linda McMahon, his nominee to lead the Education Dept., should eventually "put herself out of a job."

title: Trump administration removes nonbinary ID marker from FAFSA form
shortDescription: Students will no longer be able to identify themselves as nonbinary when applying for federal financial aid, the Trump administration said.

title: Sanders, Hawley introduce bill to cap credit card interest rates
shortDescription: Sens. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt., and Josh Hawley, R-Mo., introduced a bill on Tuesday that would cap credit card interest rates at 10%.

title: Donald Trump says he will wind down USAID
shortDescription: USAID, a federal humanitarian agency, has been in turmoil as the Trump administration considers folding it into the State Department

title: Trump tries to ban trans women from playing on female sports teams
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is expected to issue an executive order barring trans athletes from participating on teams corresponding with their identities.

title: Trump wants his education secretary to 'put herself out of a job'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told reporters Tuesday he wants Linda McMahon, his education secretary nominee, to put herself "out of a job."
